overview: The boy stood by the window of the construction site, watching the sun, the sound of struggling behind him, the sound of the wind in the ruins, everything was gone. He stepped out, and the story begins here... Time goes backwards in memory. The boy's name is A Meng. At the age of 17, he found that he fell in love with a boy. His father's irritability, stepmother's insults, he lived extremely low self-esteem and depression. He suppressed his emotions, and this boundless loneliness eventually swallowed him...
title: Fall
